code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../../estilos/componentes/layout/footer.css';import{obtenerDatos}from'../../api';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Footer=props=>{const[contactos,setContactos]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const data=await obtenerDatos('contacto');setContactos(data);};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"holder",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:contactos.map((contacto,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:contacto.url,className:"btn-social ".concat(contacto.className),target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa ".concat(contacto.icon),"aria-hidden":"true"})},index))})})})});};export default Footer;
